name: futon-media
description: Instantly stream Movies and TV Shows via Emby Media

scripts.repo: git pull; echo; git reset --hard origin/master
scripts.restart: run-s stop; forever start -l ~/.forever/futon-media.log -o ~/.forever/futon-media.out.log -e ~/.forever/futon-media.err.log forever.json; tail -f -n 0 ~/.forever/futon-media.log
scripts.watch:node: wait-for-change dist/index.js && sleep 0.1 && watchexec --restart --debounce 100 --watch dist --exts js -- NODE_ENV=development node --inspect dist/index.js
scripts.test: del dist; run-s assert:build; node dist/index.js || true
scripts.emby:restart: echo 'killall EmbyServer; sleep 1; open -a EmbyServer; tail -f -n 100 ~/.config/emby-server/logs/embyserver.txt | sedbat'
scripts.emby:del: echo 'rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/cache/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/activitylog.*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/collections/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/playlists/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/logs/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/movies/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/shows/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/metadata/library/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/transcoding-temp/*;'
scripts.emby:del:all: echo 'rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/cache/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/activitylog.*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/collections/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/displaypreferences.*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/library.*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/playlists/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/logs/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/movies/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/shows/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/metadata/library/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/root/default/*; rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/transcoding-temp/*;'

author: Robert Laverty <roblav96@gmail.com> (https://github.com/roblav96)
